Class InventoryManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.InventoryManager

extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages object inventories

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      InventoryManager()
      Constructor ensures that all objects are created when the program initiates

      Constructor that makes sure all inventory arrays are the same initially

      void addProduct​(SalableObject p)
      This method adds a Salable object of the arraylist products if the item is not found in the array list (quantity reaches 0) if it's found in the arraylist then it will increase the quantity by 1

      This class decrements the quantity of an object when sold will be used more later

      This Method saves an ArrayList of Salable Objects to a JSON file
      void sort​(java.util.Comparator<SalableObject> comper)
      This method sorts the ArrayList of salable objects based on Name or Price in ascending or descending order
